replies.body:
We are aiming to bring back item sets in patch 7.10 or a patch later depending on how it goes on PBE 
--> http://imgur.com/a/wT4cS

I noticed Xayah and Rakan can't use my custom sets? I have a few that are set to be available to all champs, mostly just to lump all the ad items together for unfamiliar adcs or mage items for mages, but Xayah and Rakan apparently don't register... It's not crippling but I want to put together a Rakan set and even the third party item set sites don't appear to let me do it :(
item sets are the best thing ever! not all of us have photographic memories haha

No one cares about item sets. I want to view my friends list while in champion select. Also, I'd like to see a recently played feature so I can dodge if I get the same troll in back-to-back games. After that, I would like it if my client quit automatically resizing to the smallest size after every game.
